eu.cqse.check.framework.scanner

Class StrictScanner

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.cqse.check.framework.scanner.StrictScanner
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IScanner

    public class StrictScanner
extends java.lang.Object
implements IScanner
    Wrapps an ILenientScanner and converts tokens of ETokenType.ETokenClass.ERROR into ScannerExceptions.

                    throws java.io.IOException,

        Returns the next token.
